chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo1 m z t <-> between m z t (f_1 m z)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
f_1 = M.f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart
between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (f m) i z = v /\ Iter (f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
between_expo_refl_2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> between m z t t < -> expo1 m z t
between_expo_refl_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> between m z z t < -> expo1 m z t
between_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> between m z v t -> expo1 m z v /\ expo1 m z t
expo1_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo1 m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> expo1 m z t
between_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> between m z v t -> expo m z v /\ expo m z t
expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> exd m t
expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> expo m t z
expo1_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> {expo1 m z t} + {~ expo1 m z t}
expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), expo m z t -> expo m t u -> expo m z u
exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f_1 m) n z)
exds_orb_eq_ex_large : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t)
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
exds_orb_eq_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t)
Iter_f_1_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) (S i) z = Iter (f_1 m) i (f_1 m z)
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
ex_j_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), {ex_j m z t n} + {~ ex_j m z t n}
exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f_1 m z)
exds_orb_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let p := Iter_upb m z in exds s t -> {i : nat | (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) i (Iter (f m) i z) = z
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z

```coq
```coq
intros m z t.
intro Hm.
intro Hz.
split; intros Ht.

- apply between_expo_refl_2 with (1:=Hm) (2:=Hz).
  auto.

- apply between_expo_refl_1 with (1:=Hm) (2:=Hz).
  auto.

Qed.```
